Ditangkap Polisi, Pengedar Narkoba di Tangsel Ini Juga Jualan Senpi Rakitan
04 Nov 2019, 18:54 by Matius Alfons
Tangerang Selatan - Polres Tangerang Selatan menangkap seorang pengedar narkoba sekaligus penjual senjata api rakitan, Cahyo alias Yongky (26). Tersangka disebut merakit sendiri senjata api tersebut.
Kapolres Tangerang Selatan AKBP Ferdy Irawan mengatakan temuan senjata api ini berawal dari penggeledahan rumah Cahyo di Pesanggrahan terkait narkoba jenis sabu dan ganja. Saat itu, Ferdy menyebut polisi menemukan sejumlah senjata airsoft gun yang dirakit ulang menjadi senjata api.
"Pertama, narkotika jenis sabu dan ganja, tapi dalam proses geledah ditemukan berbagai jenis senpi rakitan dan peluru senpi, yang mana terindikasi senjata airsoft gun dirakit sedemikian rupa sehingga bisa berfungsi sebagaimana layaknya senpi," kata Ferdy kepada wartawan di Polres Tangerang Selatan, Serpong, Tangerang Selatan, Senin (4/11/2019).
Ferdy mengatakan 10 gram ganja dan sabu ditemukan beserta tiga senjata api rakitan dan sejumlah airsoft gun. Sejumlah peluru revolver kaliber 5,6 dan 18 butir peluru kaliber 22 juga ditemukan.


Polisi menangkap pengedar narkoba sekaligus penjual senpi. (Matius/detikcom)

"Selain narkotika, ditemukan juga berbagai jenis senjata airsoft gun dan peluru tajam, ada yang kaliber 5,6 milimeter dan kaliber 22, dan berbagai jenis senjata airsoft gun," ucap Ferdy.


Barang bukti yang disita polisi. (Matius/detikcom)

Ferdy menjelaskan senjata api yang diamankan ternyata buatan tangan Cahyo sendiri yang diperolehnya secara otodidak. Satu buah senjata api rakitan tersebut dijual olehnya seharga Rp 5 juta.
"Dari barbuk yang ditemukan ada 3 senpi rakitan yang berfungsi sebagai senjata api, jadi Rp 5 juta itu dijual dengan pelurunya, baru (terjual) 1 unit," ujar Ferdy.
Tersangka dikenai UU Narkotika Nomor 35 Tahun 2009 dan UU darurat No 12 Tahun 51 dengan ancaman hukuman maksimal 20 tahun penjara. Hingga kini polisi masih melakukan pengembangan terkait dari mana tersangka mendapatkan peluru kaliber 22 dan 5,6.

Arrested by Police, Drug Dealers in South Tangerang Also Sell Homemade Senpi
Nov 04 2019, 18:54 by Matthew Alfons
Tangerang Selatan - South Tangerang District Police arrested a drug dealer and seller of homemade firearms, Cahyo alias Yongky (26). The suspect is called self-assembling these firearms.
South Tangerang Police Chief AKBP Ferdy Irawan said the findings of the firearms originated from the search of Cahyo's house in Pesanggrahan related to methamphetamine and cannabis drugs. At that time, Ferdy said the police found a number of airsoft gun that were reassembled into firearms.
"First, methamphetamine and marijuana narcotics, but in the search process found various types of homemade senpi and senpi bullets, which indicated airsoft gun guns are assembled in such a way that they can function like a senpi," Ferdy told reporters at South Tangerang Police, Serpong, South Tangerang, Monday (11/04/2019).
Ferdy said 10 grams of marijuana and methamphetamine were found along with three homemade firearms and a number of airsoft guns. A number of 5.6 caliber revolver bullets and 18 22 caliber bullets were also found.


The police arrested a drug dealer and a senpi seller. (Matthew / detikcom)

"In addition to narcotics, various types of airsoft gun and bullet weapons are found, there are 5.6 millimeter and 22 caliber caliber, and various types of airsoft gun," Ferdy said.


Evidence confiscated by the police. (Matthew / detikcom)

Ferdy explained that the secured firearms were Cahyo's own hands, which he had acquired by himself. One homemade firearm was sold by him for Rp. 5 million.
"Of the barracks found there were 3 senpi assemblies that functioned as firearms, so Rp. 5 million was sold with bullets, only (sold) 1 unit," said Ferdy.
The suspect is subject to Narcotics Law Number 35 Year 2009 and Emergency Law No. 12 Year 51 with a maximum penalty of 20 years in prison. Until now the police are still doing developments related to where the suspects get bullets of caliber 22 and 5.6.

(maa / mea)
